    OTxMetadataHolderImpl
    notifySuccess(OTransactionIdPromise id)
    This make sure that there is a synchronization between the apply of the status of transactions sequence and the logging of it in the database, to avoid to have in the status a transaction that has not yet been logged.

      public OTxMetadataHolderImpl notifySuccess(OTransactionIdPromise id)
      This make sure that there is a synchronization between the apply of the status of transactions sequence and the logging of it in the database, to avoid to have in the status a transaction that has not yet been logged.
